Hi,

I am trying to understand the TransclusionDecideRule. I landed up exploring the discovery path character notations.
Can someone help me understand how does (E - Embed) differ from (L - link) path?
An example might clarify.

Perhaps then I can also make out how TransclusionDecideRule works.

thanks!
Pranay
